channel.title: Php Phone Sites Websites on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: photolog
item.description: So my photolog is done for now. basically I can take a picture with my phone and email it to a certain address - which then authenticates the email and posts the picture to my websites photolog. This rules.. ;) check it out here.
